hero.title: AI FOR
hero.intro: This is not just coding; it's Agentic-Dev. Mastering AI today is the difference between leading the plant or falling behind. Learn to orchestrate autonomous systems to solve critical manufacturing problems.

tecSaltillo.title: Tec Saltillo Event
tecSaltillo.subtitle: Exclusive for Students
tecSaltillo.description: Join the exclusive launch event at ITS. Verification required.

student.title: Peers Workshop
student.subtitle: Open Session
student.description: Collaborative learning environment for students and pros.

corporate.title: Corporate Training
corporate.subtitle: For Enterprise
corporate.description: Custom in-house training for engineering teams.

onlineGroup.title: Online Training
onlineGroup.subtitle: Remote Access
onlineGroup.description: Live interactive sessions via Google Meet.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure & Security
infrastructure.description: Setup of Google Antigravity IDE. Implementation of SSH keys, IP protocols, and encrypted variables to protect industrial IP.

dataEngineering.title: Data Engineering & Local AI
dataEngineering.description: Building a FastAPI engine with Python/Pandas to process CSV production data. Integration of local Hugging Face models (Phi-4/Llama-3).

frontend.title: Digital Interface (Frontend)
frontend.description: Developing a professional UI with Next.js & Tailwind (Glassmorphism). Implementing secure Google Auth via Supabase.

automation.title: Automation & 3D
automation.description: Configuring n8n for anomaly detection alerts. Using AI Agents to script 3D mechanical part generation inside Blender.

bridge.title: The Bridge (Legacy Integration)
bridge.description: The final link: Creating an Excel Macro that consumes your new Python API. Controlling the AI directly from a spreadsheet.

deployment.title: Deployment
deployment.description: Deploying the full stack solution to Vercel. Live testing of the "Living Platform" accessible from any device.
